Create a bow tie key holder: Use a tie to create a key holder by attaching hooks or loops to the back of the tie and hanging your keys on them.
Use a tie as a phone stand: Fold the tie in half and use it to prop up your phone while you watch videos or make calls.
Make a tie-dye shirt: Use the tie to create a tie-dye design on a white t-shirt by wrapping it around the shirt and dyeing it.
Use a tie as a belt: Fold the tie in half and use it as a makeshift belt.
Create a tie-knot plant holder: Use a tie to create a plant holder by tying it in a knot and filling it with soil and plants.
